turns.speaker: agent

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for providing more information. Throbbing headaches behind the eyes and temples, exacerbated by stress and poor sleep, could indicate tension headaches or migraines. Over-the-counter pain relievers are often the first line of defense.
